titles.title: Clean Drinking Water for Rural Communities Act of 2023
Clean Drinking Water for Rural Communities Act of 2023

A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to modify the definitions of the terms "rural" and "rural area" for purposes of grants and loans to remedy a lack of compliance with certain drinking water standards, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.
